author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Systematically addressing remaining static analyzer warnings in the following packages:

   * `Validation/RecoTrack`
   * `Validation/RecoVertex`

#### PR validation:

It compiles

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, no backport needed.
title: address remaining static analyzer complaints in Validation/RecoTrack and Validation/RecoVertex
